oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Timothy, James Simmons
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: United States. Marine Corps; 6th Regiment; Company 80

Lieutenant Timothy James Simmons was the first Tennessee officer killed in World War I. A memorial tree was planted for him by the Catholic Children of Nashville on May 19,1919 in Centennial Park in Nashville, Tennessee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Tennessee World War I Gold Star Records, 1918-1924 (RG 53)
